body:
It was the worst playing map in the rotation, regardless of the pub rotated version with the feedback we got it just turned for the worst. A lot of people hated it and once we made the changes of removing the monument protection, the games started dragging on endlessly to the point I had to end it myself. I don't know how it can be fixed but it just does not fit in with DTM. Until we get more ideas on how to fix it, it's out for now. Please leave all opinions regarding that map to yourself.



As a mapdev, it hurt to look at and Evocal's first words were "oh my godddddd" as we agreed to remove it from rots.

title: Rendezvous 2 has been removed

replies.body:
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
I never even played it but by the looks of it I see why it was removed
replies.body_tagged:
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
I never even played it but by the looks of it I see why it was removed

replies.body: Wow look's like the teams had fun with that map. But I kinda liked that version Rendezvous better then the other two.
replies.body_tagged: Wow look's like the teams had fun with that map. But I kinda liked that version Rendezvous better then the other two.

replies.body:
Just doesn't fit DTM.

edit: Now that I read the post, I realize you stated this essentially. Unintentional :P
replies.body_tagged:
Just doesn't fit DTM.

edit: Now that I read the post, I realize you stated this essentially. Unintentional :P

replies.body:
It was so annoying. I really dislike Nebula. Going to the complete opposite side to break a block to me isn't that worth.

This map was massive people would stand on the other side already shooting arrows. Building bridges took a very long time. Also why would you build something like that as a Nebula Map? The amount of Void spacing is just to large.

This is from what I see and what I see only. Please don't take your own creation to personally. If you liked it then I won't go any further pointing out errors in this map.

replies.body:
PEOPLE DONT UNDERSTAND WE CANT MAKE IT CTW AGAIN AAAAAA IM GONNA LOSE MY HEAD

At the moment, Avicus doesn't support CTW maps, so it is impossible for us to add it back as a CTW map. I hope you all understand, we're gonna try our best to make this map fit DTM... somehow... :/
